settings.tag: APPLY TODAY AND REAP THE BENEFITS
settings.heading: Become A Vet Naturals Ambassador
settings.subheading: The place to come together and share in the love of Vet Naturals dog nutritional supplements with friends, family and most importantly their four-legged loved ones.

settings.heading: You Belong Here
settings.description:
• Belong in a community that loves their pets.
  • Acquire a unique coupon code to share with family and friends.
  • Recognize the importance of giving pets premium suppliments full of vitamins
  • Keep up with upcoming deals and promotions by being the first to know via our news letter

settings.heading: Perks of Being an Ambassador
settings.description:
• Two free samples of your choice to try. (More information on this will come via email)
  • A lifetime 15% off Vetnaturals.com
  • 10% commission on any of our product that is purchased with your discount code (post discount)!
  • A repost of your pup on our instagram
  • An exclusive 20% off discount that you can share with your family and friends (Limit: 1 use per person)

settings.description1:
Please make sure to not post your referral code onto any Vet Naturals® social media platforms - this special code is made just for your friends, family, and followers.

Do not post your link to coupon websites such as RetailMeNot, Knoji, DealSpotr, BusinessInsider, CouponChief, etc.

If we see your code on any coupon sharing websites, your code will become deactivated. Reselling any Vet Naturals® product is strictly prohibited and will result in loss of membership to the Ambassador program and revocation of your coupon codes.

You cannot refer yourself. Abusing your family and friends discount will result in loss of membership to the Ambassador program and revocation of your coupon codes. You cannot refer yourself. Abusing your family and friends discount will result in loss of membership to the Ambassador program and revocation of your coupon codes.

You are not to use any Vet Naturals logos or trademarks outside of the creative assets we provide.

We may request removal of any Vet Naturals provided assets at any time for any reason.

Vet Naturals reserves the right to reverse commission at any time due to returns, cancellations or erroneous order duplications.

Vet Naturals may suspend or remove your affiliation at any time without warning. Vet Naturals reserves the right, at any time, to review your placement and approve the use of Your Links and require that you change the placement or use to comply with the guidelines provided to you.

You are not an employee of Vet Naturals and must provide an appropriate disclaimer on all promotional content.

Negative commentary or offensive content (ie. Adult themed, discriminatory, threatening, or obscene) will result in disqualified purchases and a loss of commission and/or affiliation. You must comply with all federal, state and local regulations within your jurisdiction. This includes applicable governing marketing emails (ie CAN-SPAM Act), and all other anti-spam laws.

settings.heading: Made By Vets, Approved By Pets
settings.description: We are pet parents too and we understand how much your dog mean to you. We have put the best active ingredients in the chews, so we can make sure your dog has the best hip and joint supplement that's affordable for all.
settings.features:
• Dog joint Pain relief: Alleviating dog's pain and increasing mobility, our dog supplement for joints contain Glucosamine,MSM, Chondroitin, cold Water, Fish Oils, Omegas 3 & 6 and Organic Turmeric.
  • Staying Active: Whatever the size and age of your dog, joint supplements with glucosamine can help prevent joint inflamation and provide dog arthritis pain relief.
  • Enhance your Dog's Health: Dog n Glucosamine, Chondroitin and MSM together provide a powerful combination that will repair, support and provide healing dog hip and joint support.

settings.heading: Why Dogs And Parents Love Vet Naturals
settings.description: Our team of Vets ensures the best natural support for your dog

settings.description1: Helps to promote healthy cartilage ligaments, tendons and synovial fluid. They stimulate cartel syntesis and delay cartilage degeneration
settings.description2: High in omega fatty acids, fish oil for dogs helps reduce immflamation, increases stamina, and adds moisture to ensure a healthy skin and coat. Linolenic(Omega 3) and Linoleic(Omega 6) helps with dog arthritis, fighting inflammatory diseases.
settings.description3: Contains a compound called curucumin, the active ingredient, which has antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and wound healing properties for dog health.

settings.heading: Veterinary Naturals Announces its Yearly Scholarship Program
settings.subheading: The animal lovers at Vet Naturals are excited to announce their yearly scholorship program for up-and-coming veterinary students. We want this $500 award to go to a dedicated student who loves animals and wants to keep them happy and healthy.

settings.heading: Elegibility Requirements
settings.description:
We know how challenging the veterinary field is, and we want this scholorship to go to a hardworking students who needs a push in the right direction.
If you are 18 or older and with a GPA greater than 3.0, you're welcome to apply.
Interested? Find Out How to Apply Now.

settings.heading: Application Process - How To Apply
settings.subheading: Because we're looking for the widest entrant pool, we've made our application process as straightforward and easy as possible. Here's how to apply:
settings.description:
• Write a 1000+ word essay on the topic: "How Holistic Care Can Help Pets Live Longer, Happier Lives
  • Send the completed essay to us at scholarship@vetnaturals.com on or before March 30, 2021
  • Make sure the essay is in the PDF or Word format, as Google Docs and Dropbox link aren't accepted.
  • Make the essay creative and original. We don't tolerate plagiarism, and if your work is to be copied external source, it will be rejected.
  • Don't forget to include your name, your contact information, and your school's name and info.

settings.heading: Developed By Vets, Approved By Pets®
settings.description: Providing your loved pet with an effective selection of high quality, natural supplements.

settings.quote: “My 15 year old Border Collie likes the smaller size of the kibble. She has become quite fussy with what she eats, but she does like this food.”
settings.name: John Doe, Vet Naturals Customer
settings.quote2: “My dog has been eating this diet for 6 years now and she has been healthy so far. It's not the cheapest of all dog food but it does help her mobility and maintain her weight.”

settings.heading: All Natural. All Love.
settings.subheading: We are pet parents working with veterinarians to create the best dog supplements. We use the best natural and organic ingredients.  You want the best life for your dog.  We want to make that affordable.

settings.heading: OUR PASSION
settings.description:
• We are pet parents working with a team of veterinarians to create the best lives for our dogs. We use best natural and organic ingredients. Combining herbs, holistic remedies alongside the traditional active ingredients, we are able to get the best results for our dogs. At the same time, as much as we love our dogs, we know how expensive it can be to take care of your best friend.
  • We became frustrated, angry and dismayed by how much the ‘big’ companies were jacking up the prices of supplements for our dogs.
  • We realized we are not alone, so we set out to create the best line of dog supplements. Our goal was to make them affordable for our family and yours.

settings.heading: Our commitment to Quality, Innovation & Values
settings.description:
• Our ingredients meet stringent U.S. quality standards
  • We do not source ingredients from China
  • Our products are free from fillers, by-products and artificial colors and flavors
  • We will continue to explore formulas and work with top veterinarians to always bring natural and organic human grade ingredients into our products and to your dog

settings.heading: Nutrition
settings.description: Our dogs deserve only human grade ingredients, quality and the best nutrition. So Veterinary Naturals supplements only contain the highest quality medicinal, natural and organic ingredients. You can feel safe and know that we never source any ingredients from China. All our products are made in the USA.

settings.heading: Safety
settings.description:
• We work with suppliers who are cGMP and/or meet the FDA’s highest standards for quality
  • All of our products are manufactured in the United States
  • Testing is conducted at all stages of the manufacturing process

settings.description1: Helps to promote healthy cartilage ligaments, tendons and synovial fluid. They stimulate cartel syntesis and delay cartilage degeneration
settings.description2: High in omega fatty acids, fish oil for dogs helps reduce immflamation, increases stamina, and adds moisture to ensure a healthy skin and coat. Linolenic(Omega 3) and Linoleic(Omega 6) helps with dog arthritis, fighting inflammatory diseases.
settings.description3: Contains a compound called curucumin, the active ingredient, which has antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, antibacterial and wound healing properties for dog health.
